name: Playable Figma Crossword
description:
The New York Times Crossword from 2/20/2012, playable as a Figma prototype through their interactive components feature! Simply hover over a box and type a letter to fill it in, or press DEL/BACKSPACE to clear.


Crossword created by Samuel A. Donaldson (not mine whatsoever! I could never). The original crossword can be found here.


Games as prototype inspired by @klossich's many interactive components puzzle games â€” check them out!
